name: Girls Overboard
description:
STORY

"From all over the world people travel to the island chain of Kawaii in search of recreation, relaxation, and above all...romance."
While Kawaii island is a vacation destination for most people, you take on the role of a local fisherman down on his luck. Use stamina to cast your fishing net and collect materials, then combine those materials into gifts you can give to beautiful women.

GAMEPLAY

Girls Overboard is a free-to-play dating sim. Enjoy casual gameplay, unlock different outfits, build relationships, explore each girl's unique story and animated 2D artwork!


Use your fishing net to collect gems and fill up your Material Box! Upgrade your net to accumulate gems faster and give you more options for the merging phase of gameplay. If you're lucky, you can even earn bonus points. So, the more gems the better!


Behold a completely new concept you have never heard of... Match-3! Now, while Girls Overboard follows the classical match-3 rules, what makes it different is you have influence over what gems appear. From the number of gems to the most common colors, by using your net and selecting bait types, you are in control. Bend the future to your will!


Use the points you earn to craft gifts for your waifus! Gifts come in a range of colors and qualities. Different color gifts require different color points and higher quality gifts require a higher number of points. You get what you pay for!


Give gifts to your waifu in order to increase your relationship and win her heart. Match the color gift with each girl's favorite color to build the relationship even faster. The color of love!


Alright boys, the part you've been waiting for. Each girl features four high-quality illustrations, hand painted to perfection and animated in Live2d. The higher your relationship goes, the racier of situations you'll unlock. Get ready to go ALL THE WAY!

FEATURES

  • 5 gorgeous ladies to romance. (More to come!!)
  • Animated illustrations CG to unlock that bring the characters to life!
  • Over 100 fun and sexy outfits to unlock! Gift your special gal an outfit tailor-made for her.
  • Fully voiced! A talented cast of English voice actresses! (Except for the main character)
  • Gallery Mode! Enjoy the art you've unlocked at any time!
  • Increase your chance of reward with the optional in-game purchase.
  • Music that makes you want to dance in your chair!
  • Free to play!
  • And much more!

Join the cute anime girls of Girls Overboard on Kawaii Island for a Wet n' Wild vacation!
